ComicInfo.Penciller: Steve Lieber,Gary Davis,Eddie Campbell,Peter Mullins,April Post,Steven Lieber,Gary Davis,Eddie Campbell,Peter Mullins,April Post,Steven Lieber
ComicInfo.Summary: When the Eyeball Kid draws first blood, he figures his fight with Hermes is going to be a cakewalk. But he hasn't reckoned on the power of Hermes' weapon, the Golden Fleece! Witness the stolen power of Zeus pitted against the might of the God of War -- and remember, "One lives, one dies"! Also in this issue, journey back to the dawn of man in an all-new Paleolove story, as the lone warrior Daishon seeks revenge for the death of his wife and child!
ComicInfo.Title: The Oracle Scam; An Edwardian Nursery
ComicInfo.Writer: Eddie Campbell,Gary Davis,Jeffrey Lang,Wes Kublick,Gary Davis,Eddie Campbell,Wes Kublick,Jeffrey Lang
